name: Evil vs Evil (MattShaileGameJam)
description:
4 of us did a 48 hour game jam with a randomly generated theme: "Evil vs Evil"

The version I have uploaded here has had about an additional 10 hours spent on it, as I really wanted to finish the rough bits and add some story flavour.

See the other participants entries:

https://strangeweekend.itch.io/evil-vs-evil
https://stwupton.itch.io/evil-vs-evil
